headline: Is Now the Right Moment for EPAM After Shares Drop Nearly 36% This Year?
summary: Wondering what to do next with EPAM Systems stock? You are not alone. After a tough year, with shares sliding 35.9% year-to-date and down a striking 57.5% from five years ago, plenty of investors are asking whether this is the time to buy, hold, or steer clear. Price action over the past month has been lackluster too, down 5.8%, and even in just the last week, EPAM slipped another 1.9%. The mood around the stock has clearly shifted, with recent moves reflecting both caution and a change in...
